Address.value: 5808 LAKE WASHINGTON BOULEVARD NE,SUITE 201, KIRKLAND, Washington, 98033, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Monolithic Power Systems is an analog and mixed-signal chipmaker, specializing in power management solutions. The firm's mission is to reduce total energy consumption in end systems, and it serves the computing, automotive, industrial, communications, and consumer end markets. Monolithic Power uses a fabless manufacturing model, partnering with third-party chip foundries to host its proprietary BCD process technology.
